alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 2:19PM MST until March 11 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 2 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting over 40 mph. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 2 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County
